backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, access control, and detailed resident-related data types for medications, vitals, ADLs, and contacts.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping medication‑related UI requirements to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file, including layout, pages, hooks, and modals.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light/dark themes and global UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with authentication gating, profile initialization, and app shell rendering.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays ADL records for a resident with a table view and an option to add new records.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form for creating new ADL records with fields for date, activity, assistance level, and notes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Reusable access‑denied screen with messaging and navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for collecting and saving a new user's profile including name, role, and optional related resident IDs.
Layout wrapper handling authentication via Internet Identity and rendering login or full app UI with header, content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays MAR records for a resident with a table view and provides an option to add new records if permitted.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal form for adding a new MAR record, allowing selection of active medications and entering administration details.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Renders active and discontinued medication lists with optional add, edit, and discontinue controls and physician info.
Shows a resident's medications with add, edit, and discontinue actions and status badges.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal form for creating a new medication for a resident, handling input fields, administration times, and submitting via mutation.
Modal form for editing an existing medication, prefilled with current values and updating via mutation.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Badge component that displays a resident’s code status as either DNR or Full Code with styled coloring.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Large modal for creating a new resident, capturing personal info, physicians, contacts, pharmacy data, and medications.
Modal for editing an existing resident’s core information, physicians, and pharmacy details and saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Generates a printable resident profile report including demographics, physicians, and medication lists.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a table of daily vitals for a resident and allows authorized users to record new vitals via modal.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal form for entering daily vital signs and submitting them via useAddDailyVitals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for profiles, residents, stats, and clinical data operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables plus print-specific styles for layout and visibility control.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Helper functions determining user permissions and mapping user types to labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Resident dashboard with filtering, sorting, stats display, and ability to add new residents.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Resident profile page that loads resident data, manages multiple modals, medication actions, and UI tabs, with permissions and print support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins such as typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state file defining existing features, new feature requests, metadata, and versioning for build planning.
